column3:
Maybe not print the whole object, when we print the nicely formatted error?

What has always held me back from doing this (sensible) thing is that scripts may be relying on bitcoin-cli's output for errors to be as it is.

This line `strPrint = "error: " + error.write();` get's overwritten at L198 when `error.isObject()` (currently always).\nHmm... if someone relies on a/the output of a RPC client application like bitcoin-cli he should definitively rethink his API design and probably directly use the JSON RPC API.\n
